title: Jacky Cheung
summary: Jacky Cheung Hok-yau (born 10 July 1961) is a Hong Kong singer, songwriter and actor. He is the best-selling Chinese music artist and one of the best-selling artists of all time, with sales of over 120 million records worldwide.[3] Cheung has been dubbed the "God of Songs" of contemporary Chinese music and is one of the "Four Heavenly Kings".[4] He is known for his lengthy, sell-out tours, his best-selling album The Goodbye Kiss and his personal Private Corner album project, for which he coined the phrase 'Canto-jazzâ€™.[5]
